allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial release: Two Hearts landing page

Complete landing page for twoheartsapp.com with hero, features carousel,
testimonials, FAQ, privacy policy, and terms of service. Pure HTML/CSS/JS,
ready for Vercel deployment.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Google Analytics \(G-R5HN9MDD6L\) to all pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add Vercel Analytics and Speed Insights to all pages

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
